NETIZEN 2k22 by ITSA

Government Polytechnic Jalgaon ~ The Department of Information Technology invites everyone to its NETIZEN 2k22 by featuring the Futuristic Beauty of events.Participate and be the part of the #NetCity The events exhibits will be on May 12, 2022.

All paritcipants will receive Cetificate of participation and Winners! will get Exiting Prizes worth 10,000 INR.

Our Events

Carrom

Conduction and rules : 

1.	All core rules of carrom are applied.
2.	Only dual matches will be conducted.
3.	Only Free style (points) matches will be played.
4.	 Each game will be of 160 points. 
5.	First one to complete the targated point will be the winner of round.
6.	All the matches will be knockout matches. 
7.	Thumb shot or back shot is not allowed (strictly).

Chess

Event Rules -
1. There will be no personal timer for the first 20 mins but if the match extends then the players will be provided a 10 min timer for both.
2. Players should try to bring their own chess board but if they don't have then department will provide them.
3. Matchmaking will be decided by the event co-ordinators.
4. Players will be eliminated if they lose.

Chess Rules -
1. All the core rules are applied.
2. Three illegal moves and you are out of the game.
3. No points based system.
4. When you are in doubt, feel free to ask arbiter/co-ordinators.
5. You have to move the piece you touch.
7. Do not interfere with others' game.
8. You have to turn off your cell phone.

Blind C

3 rounds will be conducted.
1 .Every Round will have 3 Ques.(Solve Any 1)
2. IDE will be Codeblocks.
3. The moniter screen will be Off (unvisible).
4. min timing required for all round is 2hrs
5. The Programmer with less errors will be declared as winner.
6. participation cert. Will be provided.

Brain Buzzer

Conduction : 1st round - Question Paper Round. 2nd round - In this Buzzer round we will create the team of 4 participants randomly.

Rules : In Buzzer round the team/team member who rings the buzzer first will given 1st priority to ans the question.

BGMI

Rounds and Rules : 

1. There will be 3 rounds in this game.
2. All matches will be played in squad only.
3. All participants will play all three rounds.
4. Players will get points according to following :
Kill points : 10 points/kill
 #1 : 25 points bonus + kill points
 #2 : 20 points bonus + kill points
 #3 : 15 points bonus + kill points
 #4 : 10 points bonus + kill points
 #5 : 5 points bonus + kill points
5. Points will be given to squad as per squad kill
6. Bonus Points will be given as per Squad Rank.
7. Bring mobile charger if needed and wifi will be provided by us.

FreeFire

Rounds and Rules : 

1. Tournament only for Squad .
2.  We will conduct total 5 Rounds.
Every squad will play a total of 5 matches and
one with highest points gets declared as winner 🏆
3. Points are based on Kill , Position , Booyah.
4. Kill -  3 pts per kill
5. Position (Only top 2 Position are considered) - 10 pts 
6. Booyah  -  15 pts +
7. The Squad with higher points will win the tournament.
8. Bring mobile charger if needed and wifi will be provided by us.

NFS-pc

1. It will be conducted in Network Lab of IT department.
2. Event timing will be announce later, Probably 10 am.
3. After Multiple rounds a winner will be selected by its best performance.
4. Winner will get certificate and amazing cash prize.
5. All participants will get a certificate.

Fun Fair

A funfair is an event which will be held in a parking of IT/ME dep. The people who want organize and operate it please contact the respected co-ordinators.Limited entries hurry up !!. Install your stall, earn and win.
